data.title: Next.js
data.Description: A React Framework with extensive features created by Vercel.

data.title: Typescript
data.Description: A Superset of Javascript that adds features like type system that can be compiled to any versions of Javascript. Created By Microsoft

data.title: Tailwind CSS
data.Description: A CSS Framework that has built-in classes that is helpful for web developers to quickly build User Interfaces

data.title: MDX
data.Description: Markdown with JSX. Markdown allows the user to write content without worrying the confusing syntax of HTML.

data.title: Sass/SCSS
data.Description: Sass or "Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets" brings CSS with Superpowers such as nesting

data.title: Github
data.Description: An offsite location to store git repositories.

data.title: Vercel
data.Description: Hosting Service for production builds of front-end applications especially the one's built with Next.js
